title: Get the activity log of a Business Center

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: bc_id
parameters.description: Business Center ID. To obtain the list of Business Centers that you can access, use /bc/get/ .

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Query start date, in the format of YYYY-MM-DD (UTC+0). You need to specify both start_date and end_date or neither. If both start_date and end_date are not specified, the activity log for the past seven days will be returned. Recommended date range: six months. Example: 2025-01-01 .

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: Query end date, in the format of YYYY-MM-DD (UTC+0). You need to specify both start_date and end_date or neither. If both start_date and end_date are not specified, the activity log for the past seven days will be returned. Recommended date range: six months. Example: 2025-01-01 .

parameters.name: activity_type
parameters.description: Activity type to query. Enum values: ALL : All types of changes. USER : User. Changes mainly related to members and organization, including but not limited to the following scenarios: Invitation of a member to the Business Center Acceptance of the invitation to join the Business Center Removal of a member from the Business Center ACCOUNT : Account. Changes mainly related to creation and access management of ad accounts, including but not limited to the following scenarios: Creating an ad account Assigning a member access to an ad account Revoking a member's access to an ad account Sharing access to an ad account with a partner Revoking a partner's access to an ad account ASSET : Asset. Changes mainly related to assets, including but not limited to the following scenarios: Creating or deleting a catalog Requesting to add or approving the request to add a TikTok Shop Assigning a member access to an asset Revoking a member's access to an asset BUSINESS : Business. Changes mainly related to the Business Center, including but not limited to the following scenarios: Creating the Business Center Changing the setting of the Business Center, including name and company name Default value: ALL .

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: The language of the activity log. Default value: en . To find out the enum values, see Enum values for lang .

parameters.name: sort_field
parameters.description: Field to sort by. Enum value: operation_time : To sort by the time when the activity occurred, which corresponds to the time parameter within the returned object array changelog_list . Default value: operation_time .

parameters.name: sort_type
parameters.description: Sorting order. Enum values: DESC : Descending. When sort_field is operation_time or not passed, this value means to sort from the most recent to earliest activity. ASC : Ascending. When sort_field is operation_time or not passed, this value means to sort from the earliest to the most recent activity. Default value: DESC .

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Current page number. Value range: â‰¥ 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Page size. Value range: 1-50. Default value: 10.
